titleStmt.title: John W. Finnell to Daniel C. Wickliffe
CWG7703

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, James F. Robinson: Appointments by the Governor, Military Appointments, 1862-1863

body.p:
UNITED WE STAND DIVIDED WE FALL
Head-Quarters Kentucky Volunteers,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Louisville, Septr 15th 1862
Hon: D. C. Wickliffe
Sec: of State --
I have this day Comd. & delivered the following viz:

David P. Middleton Asst. Surgeon dated this day --
Wm P. Roper Capt: promoted date of Com: -- is Oct 13, 1861 --
Ezra W. Gray 2d Lieut: date Aug 15, 1862
Robert H. King Captain is pro: date ^of Com:^ 9 Jan 1862
Aaron C. Shacklett Capt: is pro: " Nov. 12. 1861
Francis H. Cosby Lieut is pro: " Feb 9, 1862
Com: issd. to Robert H. King as 1 Major -- date of same Aug. 13, 1862 --
Do Aaron C. Shacklett as 3 Major -- same date --
Do Francis H. Crosby as Captain -- same date --
Do Ira Hart Stout as Adjutant -- date of Com: July 30, 1862 --
Major M. H. Owsley has resigned -- date of Com: Decr 4, 1861 --
Capt: E. J. Mitchell has resigned date of Com: Sep 27, 1861 --
2d Lieut: J. H. Todd has resigned -- date July 11, 1862
2d Lieut: J. A. McCullah -- date Nov. 13. 1861,
Adjutant James H. Turner -- date Nov 28, 1861,
Captain A. G. Smith -- date Nov. 12. 1861,
Captain Kavanaugh Bullock -- date Mar 9, 1862

I am
Resply
John W. Finnell
Adj. Gen: Ken Vols
